Memories Around The Table
R Place Will Have You Coming Back
At R Place Grill & Spirits we focus on what matters most — tasty and plentiful food, while providing friendly and efficient service to make your experience worthwhile.
A fresh, scratch-made, classic American grill....that’s R Place. Whether enjoying one of our legendary salads, oversized sandwiches, or a slab of tender, slow roasted prime rib you’ll find R Place to be a comfortable, affordable throwback to a simpler, better time.
Every plate achieves that elusive, cuisine-defining balance of sweet, salty, and sour — even dessert.
Popular Dishes
What Our Customers Are Saying
“Delicious food and large portions. Definitely ate too much. Highly recommended! Baked potato soup was probably the best I've ever had.”
“I just can’t believe how fast they served our food. It's so much food for the price — it’s totally worth it. So delicious 10/10! The staff is amazing”
“Fantastic place to eat! The food is delicious and they give you good portions. The salads are great. The salad is big, it was more than I could eat. A buttery honey croissant comes with every salad. Delicious!”
COME SEE WHAT’S GOING ON AT R PLACE!
LOCATION
HOURS
715 Montague AveGreenwood, South Carolina, 29649(864) 223-4538
Sunday —Thursday10:30am - 9pmFriday — Saturday10:30am - 10pm
R Place Grill & Spirits

#block-yui_3_17_2_1_1584636438490_5326 {--sqs-block-content-flex: 0;
}
At R Place Grill & Spirits we focus on what matters most — tasty and plentiful food, while providing friendly and efficient service to make your experience worthwhile.A fresh, scratch-made, classic American grill....that’s R Place. Whether enjoying one of our legendary salads, oversized sandwiches, or a slab of tender, slow roasted prime rib you’ll find R Place to be a comfortable, affordable throwback to a simpler, better time.

$10.79
R Place Salad
Mixed greens topped with turkey, ham, chopped eggs, Monterey Jack & cheddar cheeses, diced tomatoes, almonds, and freshly cooked bacon
$10.99
Bangkok Wrap
Our great salad made into a sandwich! Lightly breaded shrimp, flash fried & tossed in a spicy Thai sauce with Applewood bacon and ham & mixed Monterrey Jack & cheddar cheese
$17.99
Herb Encrusted Chicken
Italian bread crumbs encrusted Chicken over penne pasta. Finished in lemon caper beurre blanc with key West medley * parmesan cheese
